invalid_string_min: String must contain at least {{minimum}} character(s)
invalid_string_max: String must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s)
invalid_number_min: Number must be greater than or equal to {{minimum}}
invalid_number_max: Number must be less than or equal to {{maximum}}
too_small: Array must contain at least {{minimum}} element(s)
too_big: Array must contain at most {{maximum}} element(s)
not_multiple_of: Number must be a multiple of {{multipleOf}}
invalid_intersection_types: Intersection results could not be merged
not_included: Value is not included in the valid options

name.too_short: Name must be at least 2 characters
name.invalid_format: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes

nationalId.invalid_checksum: Please enter a valid National ID

dateOfBirth.too_young: You must be at least 18 years old
dateOfBirth.future_date: Date of birth cannot be in the future

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
email.too_short: Email must be at least 5 characters

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

phone.too_long: Phone number must not exceed 15 digits

address.too_short: Address must be at least 10 characters

city.too_short: City name must be at least 2 characters
city.too_long: City name must not exceed 50 characters

state.too_short: State/Emirate name must be at least 2 characters
state.too_long: State/Emirate name must not exceed 50 characters
state.invalid_format: State/Emirate name can only contain letters

postalCode.invalid_format: Postal code must be exactly 5 digits

numberOfDependents.not_integer: Number of dependents must be a whole number
numberOfDependents.negative: Number of dependents cannot be negative

occupation.too_short: Occupation must be at least 2 characters

employer.too_short: Employer name must be at least 2 characters
employer.too_long: Employer name must not exceed 100 characters

totalSavings.required: Please enter a valid savings amount

monthlyRent.required: Please enter a valid rent amount

employmentCircumstances.too_short: Please provide at least 50 characters describing your employment circumstances

reasonForApplying.too_short: Please provide at least 50 characters explaining your reason for applying

reasonForApplying.too_few_words: Please provide at least 10 words explaining your reason for applying

agreeToTerms.required: You must agree to the terms and conditions

allowContactForClarification.required: Please indicate if we can contact you for clarification
